name: Body & Soul
description:
You play as a Lost Soul who wants to escape Limbo.  In this puzzle/platformer you must use the lost soul's ability to leave it's host body. 

Controls:

W/A/S/D : Move

H: Shoot

J: Jump

K: Soul Swap

Made for my first game jam the GMTK 2021 Game  Jam. This was quite the challenge and really good lesson on what not to do for my next game jam.
